interpolate

public static final Vector2D interpolate(double ratio,
                                         Vector2D u,
                                         Vector2D v)
Create a new vector which is the interpolated value between two vectors. If ratio is 0 then the response is equal to u and if ratio is 1 then the repsonse is equal to v. Values between 0 and 1 return a value between u and v.

Parameters:
ratio - Ratio
u -
v -
Returns:
Interplated value
